meanings.definition: Any of a group of naturally occurring unsaturated steroid alcohols, typically waxy solids.
meanings.sent1: The sterols in plants help maintain their structure and protect them.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the role of sterols in human health and nutrition.
meanings.sent3: The sterols in the wax made the candle burn brighter than usual.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was like the sterols in a plant, essential and strong.
meanings.sent5: The sterols in the soap made it gentle on the skin.

meanings.definition: A type of lipid found in cell membranes and important for various biological functions.
meanings.sent1: Our body needs sterols to build healthy cell membranes.
meanings.sent2: Doctors monitor the levels of sterols in patients with heart conditions.
meanings.sent3: The sterols in the cell membrane were having a party, dancing around.
meanings.sent4: His leadership was like the sterols in a team, providing structure and support.
meanings.sent5: The sterols in the bloodstream act as messengers, signaling important information.
